title: Fix hardcoded default values in introduce_null_object.py
description: The introduce_null_object command hardcodes default values based on variable names ('name' → 'Unknown', 'plan' → 'Basic'). Need generic type-based defaults.

title: Fix hardcoded function names in decompose_conditional.py
description: The decompose_conditional command hardcodes 'is_winter', 'winter_charge', and 'summer_charge' as function names. Need to generate names dynamically from condition/branch expressions.

title: Fix hardcoded _field suffix in duplicate_observed_data.py
description: The duplicate_observed_data command assumes fields end with '_field' suffix and looks for hardcoded method name 'start_field_focus_lost'. Need pattern detection or parameterization.
